extendedInfo.description: The ultimate application to generate QR code for multiple types of data and share. It is a very quick and reliable QR code reader or scanner and generator and much more.Direct download link: http://tinyurl.com/8ralf9jYou can scan: â¢ Product code, UPC Barcode or QR code from any product items on the shelf when your shopping and comparing price â¢ Book's isbn code and look up the book and compare prices â¢ Web address or magazine qr code and view it through browser right away and the link saved in your history â¢ Contact qr code and import to your address book (Very few apps actually work) â¢ Calendar qr code and save to your calendar â¢ Phone number and save to your contacts â¢ SMS message and you can share it â¢ Another application's url so you can download it too â¢ Web Address and open it in browser â¢ Email with messages and send it using email â¢ Geo location and open it in map â¢ WIFI Setting and save to your phone â¢ any free textQR Pro is also a very comprehensive QR code generator which allows you to quickly generate QR code in multiple formats. Today you can generate QR code for the following: â¢ From any of your phone's applications â¢ From your existing bookmarks â¢ From your existing clipboard text.  â¢ From your existing calendar events (With your permission to read) or creating a new calendar event without saving it and generate QR code.  â¢ From your existing contacts (With your permission to proceed) or creating a new contact without saving it and generate QR code.  â¢ From your existing emails(With your permission to proceed) or creating a new email without saving it and generate QR code.  â¢ From your existing geo location or manually enter your geo location â¢ From your existing phone numbers (With your permission to read) or creating a new phone number without saving it and generate QR code.  â¢ From your existing SMS message (With your permission to proceed) or creating a new SMS message without saving it and generate QR code.  â¢ From your existing browser history (With your permission to proceed) or creating a new url address without saving it and generate QR code.  â¢ Manually enter any free text, product item number, book's ISBN number.With all the generated QR code, you can easily share it thourgh email with your friends or families with a few button clicks. With the aid of email selector, it is becoming even easier. QR Pro also keeps all of your scanning history so you can review all your past scanning QR code/barcode history. You can also share and clean your history with a button click.Fewer applications can be as complete, functional as QR ProLicense: - Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0  http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0Requirements:  - Android 2.1 or better  - 1.12MB of free spaceUser Permissions: - android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION - android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE,  - android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE,  - android.permission.CAMERA,  - android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE,  - android.permission.INTERNET,  - android.permission.VIBRATE,  - android.permission.FLASHLIGHT,  - android.permission.READ_CALENDAR - android.permission.READ_CONTACTS, - android.permission.READ_SMS - android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS,  - android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE,  - android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS,  - android.permission.WAKE_LOCK - com.android.browser.permission.READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS, Support:We are happy to hear from you for any questions, concerns and feedback.Google+
